title: Dr. med. Nidal Toman
subtitle: Specialist in plastic, aesthetic & reconstructive surgery.
description: Nidal TOMAN, M.D., Ph.D. is an influential person with high connectedness in the field of medicine. Born in 1975, Munich, he is a renowned expert in psychophysiology. Upon his graduation from Freien Universität Berlin, he started his career as an assistant doctor at Schlossparkklinik, Berlin in the Department of Plastic, Hand and Breast Surgery, as well as at DRK Clinic, Westend, Berlin in the Departments of Plastic, Hand and Breast Surgery; Migraine Surgery Centre.

In 2009, Dr Toman obtained the title of “Specialist in Plastic-Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery” following his successful completion of a medical specialist examination. Later in that year, he was appointed as the “Head of The Centre for Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery” at the DRK clinics in Berlin, making him the youngest Chief of Medicine in the world.  A year later, he was awarded a Professorship. Until 2016, Dr Toman worked as “Head of Plastic and Aesthetic Surgery” in various hospitals. Dr Toman has been a self-employed surgeon of plastic and aesthetic and served exquisite clientele at his private clinic located in Uhlandstraße 33, Berlin ever since. He is recognized throughout Europe and the Middle-East as one of the top specialists in his field. His experience, competence and sincere dedication are valued not only by his patients but also his colleagues far beyond the borders of Germany.

He wrote his PhD thesis in the Centre for Space and Aviation Medicine Berlin, a department connected to the Department of Physiology of the FU Berlin which formed a close cooperation with the ESA and NASA. His theses led him to become a prominent and notable expert in the field of psychophysiology. In journalism and media, he is cited often and interviewed by numerous prestigious journals such as Morgenpost, Welt, Zeit and many more.
profileDescription: It is important to me to achieve the best possible and natural results with healthy recovery phases for my patients through the most modern treatment methods and scar-saving surgical techniques. At numerous national and international congresses, I was constantly educated about current and modern procedures in plastic and aesthetic surgery. I would be happy to inform you in an exclusive atmosphere about the latest developments and forms of treatment in the field of aesthetic medicine and take a lot of time for your concerns and wishes. I look forward to meeting you!
